summary: Depression is when you feel really sad and don't want to do anything. It affects millions of people worldwide, making it hard for them to enjoy things they usually like. People might feel super tired, have trouble thinking clearly, or eat and sleep too much or too little. Sometimes, it's because of tough life events, and other times, it's due to medical reasons or medications. It's important to talk to someone if you or someone you know feels this way, as it can be treated, and there are people who can help.
title: Depression (mood)
